file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-07-06 - BAGGAGE DOOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE DOOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the baggage door for general condition. B. Related Zone: 813. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 22010.2 thru STA X = 23070.2 (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 18470.2 thru STA X = 19530.2. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY BAGGAGE DOOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL ALL 05-30-07-200-801-A ♦ VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-07 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-07-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. BAGGAGE DOOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 52-Z813-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of baggage door, at zone 813, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the baggage door for painting bad condition, loose rivets, skin deformation, sealant poor condition, scratches, gouges, creases, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-07 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Inspect the folding flap structure of baggage door for general condition. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-07 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
